Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Double Punch/
Manterror/Injector:



Unitron looked around, still amazed he was alive.

"We need to attack the Cybertronian Fire quickly." Shockwave intoned.

"You mean Zardus." Unitron stated.

"Zardus is at the Cybertronian Fire, attacking those who wish to harm the 
Maximals." Vehement explained.

"We must move quickly if we are to catch him and his allies off guard." 
Firestarter said, looking to his fellow Neo Decepticons.  

"Then let's go." Shockwave ordered, transforming to his space fighter mode 
and launching off, the other Neo Decepticons following him.

Vehement looked to his fellow Brotherhood members and lifted off the ground, 
following the Decepticons with Sun Crusher and Reflector following, somewhat 
reluctant to leave the Chaos-Bringer alone.
